TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScrollBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods used to render a scroll bar control with visual styles.

span.span: Provides methods used to render a scroll bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現使用作業系統的目前視覺化樣式的捲軸控制項的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a scroll bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製自訂控制項應該具有目前視覺化樣式的外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要繪製的捲軸，可使用這個類別中方法的組合來呈現的捲軸的每個部分。To draw a scroll bar, use a combination of the methods in this class to render each part of the scroll bar. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區，這個類別的方法將會繪製目前視覺化樣式的捲軸。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the scroll bar with the current visual style. 否則，這個類別的方法會擲回。Otherwise, the methods of this class will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個所公開的項目類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂控制項，以便使用繪製捲軸，以回應滑鼠點選動作的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the methods to draw a scroll bar that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前使用此方法，您應該確認屬性會傳回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用自訂控制項的方法方法，取決於滑鼠指標位置的狀態中繪製的捲動箭號。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a scroll arrow in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
